from scapy.layers.http import *
from scapy.all import *

def http_handler(req_str):
    req = HTTPRequest()
    req.do_dissect(req_str) # è§£æè¯·æ±‚
    print('[+] req: ', req.summary())
    # body = route(req.Path.decode()) # è·¯ç”±å‡½æ•°
    body = "<h1>Hello~~~</h1>"

    print('[+] res: ', res.summary())
